title: GPT-5.3-Codex Integration and CLI v0.96.0
description: OpenAI released GPT-5.3-Codex model on February 5, 2026 with stronger reasoning, 25% faster performance, and improved instruction following compared to previous models. Codex CLI v0.96.0 (February 4, 2026) supports the new model. Earlier January releases (0.78.0-0.80.0) added branching threads, external editor editing, and project-aware configuration.

community_feedback.quote: GPT 5.3 codex just dropped, and it is Scary Good! Follows instructions much better than Opus
With both Opus 4.6 and GPT 5.3 Codex out, it is now clear that software engineering is probably beyond solved as AGI might come before 2030
Can't use GPT-5.3 even though it was mentioned in the release notes - confusion about availability
'Introducing gpt-5.3-codex' message shown frequently when using codex in both new and existing directories

title: Claude Opus 4.6 Launch
description: Anthropic launched Claude Opus 4.6 on February 5, 2026 with improved agentic coding, computer use, tool use, search, and finance capabilities. Achieved 1,606 Elo rating, beating GPT-5.2 by roughly 144 points. Claude Code 2.1.34 (February 6, 2026) included bug fixes for agent teams settings crashes. New 'agent teams' feature introduced.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Opus 4.6 spends $20K trying to write a C compiler after nearly 2,000 Claude Code sessions
Users reported elevated errors on Claude Opus 4.5 and Sonnet 4.5 with recent model inconsistencies
GPT-5.3-Codex ranked #2 on HN front page, just behind Claude Opus 4.6

title: Cursor 2.4 - Subagents, Skills, and Image Generation
description: Released January 22, 2026. Major update introducing Subagents (independent agents for discrete tasks with parallel execution), Skills (extensible domain-specific workflows via SKILL.md files), and Image Generation (generate images directly in Cursor using Google Nano Banana Pro). Latest patch version 2.4.31 released February 8, 2026.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor subagents priced as main agent - user reported subagents were billed at Opus 4.5 rates instead of cheaper model rates
How to use the image generation feature from 2.4 update? User asking how to access the feature

title: GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio â€” January Update
description: January 2026 update for Visual Studio released February 4, 2026, introducing colorized code completions, partial acceptance of code completions, and productivity improvements. VS Code January 2026 (v1.109) deprecated the GitHub Copilot extension in favor of GitHub Copilot Chat extension for all AI functionality.

community_feedback.quote: Visual Studio 2026 copilot experience is horrible

title: Gemini CLI v0.26.0 - Agent Skills and Hooks
description: Released January 26, 2026. Introduced Agent Skills for extending CLI with custom capabilities and Hooks for enhanced extensibility with 5 main hook features. v0.24.0 (January 14, 2026) added skill improvements, enhanced security features, and UI/UX improvements.

title: January 9, 2026 Release - Session Secrets via API
description: Devin AI coding agent released Session Secrets via API along with minor bug fixes and performance improvements on January 9, 2026.

community_feedback.quote: Goldman Sachs is testing Devin as a 'new employee' according to their CIO
